import { Logo, LogoSolid, View } from '@fold-ui/core'

export const docs = {
    title: 'Logo',
    subtitle: 'The Logo component enable users to use the Fold logo anywhere in their app or website.',
    description: 'There are no restrictions in coloring the logo, however the shape must not be altered.',
}

### Sizes

export const Sizes = () => {
    return (<View row gap={20}>
            <Logo size="xs" color={Token.ColorAccent300}/>
            <Logo size="sm" color={Token.ColorAccent400}/>
            <Logo size="md" color={Token.ColorAccent500}/>
            <Logo size="lg" color={Token.ColorAccent600}/>
            <Logo size="xl" color={Token.ColorAccent700}/>
            <Logo customSize={120} color={Token.ColorAccent800}/>
        </View>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Sizes />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Sizes.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Sizes = () => {
    return (
        <View
            row
            gap={20}>
            <Logo
                size="xs"
                color={Token.ColorAccent300}
            />
            <Logo
                size="sm"
                color={Token.ColorAccent400}
            />
            <Logo
                size="md"
                color={Token.ColorAccent500}
            />
            <Logo
                size="lg"
                color={Token.ColorAccent600}
            />
            <Logo
                size="xl"
                color={Token.ColorAccent700}
            />
            <Logo
                customSize={120}
                color={Token.ColorAccent800}
            />
        </View>
    )
}
```
### Sizes Solid

export const SizesSolid = () => {
    return (<View row gap={20}>
            <LogoSolid size="xs" color={Token.ColorAccent300}/>
            <LogoSolid size="sm" color={Token.ColorAccent400}/>
            <LogoSolid size="md" color={Token.ColorAccent500}/>
            <LogoSolid size="lg" color={Token.ColorAccent600}/>
            <LogoSolid size="xl" color={Token.ColorAccent700}/>
            <LogoSolid customSize={120} color={Token.ColorAccent800}/>
        </View>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<SizesSolid />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="SizesSolid.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const SizesSolid = () => {
    return (
        <View
            row
            gap={20}>
            <LogoSolid
                size="xs"
                color={Token.ColorAccent300}
            />
            <LogoSolid
                size="sm"
                color={Token.ColorAccent400}
            />
            <LogoSolid
                size="md"
                color={Token.ColorAccent500}
            />
            <LogoSolid
                size="lg"
                color={Token.ColorAccent600}
            />
            <LogoSolid
                size="xl"
                color={Token.ColorAccent700}
            />
            <LogoSolid
                customSize={120}
                color={Token.ColorAccent800}
            />
        </View>
    )
}
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
